website_summaries.verdict: A heated massage pillow that can soothe aches and pains throughout the body and is compact and lightweight enough to travel with.
pros: Boasts 4 massage nodes to provide deep tissue massage
Heat feature provides gentle warmth to relax tight muscles
Cover made of soft, cozy plush fabric and features an adjustable flap to allow you to control the massage intensity
Can be used on the neck, shoulders, upper back, lower back, hips, thighs, and calves
cons: Some users find it massages too deeply

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Finally an electric massage unit that actually does what it is described to do! I bought one for myself as I have to have reverse shoulder replacement surgery on my left shoulder. NOTHING takes the pain away. However I place the unit on top of my shoulders (behind my neck) and it does relax my end stage osteoarthritis in my shoulders and neck. I use it everywhere that I can on my body as it helps with circulation and looses the muscles that seem tense. This is the BEST buy for me
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: worth buying。One massager that fits all the need。
customer_reviews.text: This massager is easy to use with different adapters so that you can either use in your car or at home . It definitely helps with my pain on the neck and shoulder . Beside your neck and shoulders, you can also use it on your legs, arms,etc. pretty much anywhere .lighweight and portable. which reverse direction every few minutes, heat .note: this product the balls seem to get warmer than other and faster.and thick mesh ball covering, There is more power。The does offer more features like speed change/direction change/ on-off for heat
customer_reviews.author: xiaoqing

customer_reviews.title: I use this every day!
customer_reviews.text: I have chronic lower back issues, and I've been using this every morning when I wake up. I sit and drink my coffee, watch the news and use this for at least 30 minutes. The massage and heat combination really helps to soothe my tight back. The Snailax Shiatsu Massage Pillow is quiet enough so that it's not loud and disruptive in the morning while I'm quietly watching the news as my kids sleep. If you suffer from chronic or occasional back pain, I do suggest this! Also, this would be a really gift-able item!
customer_reviews.author: Mama Melanie

customer_reviews.title: great product, that's my need!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it about one month ago,works great on the lower back, shoulders, legs.I wasn't sure if it will be strong enough to really break up the facia in my back and shoulders, but it is!! And I like this decent size,I do not want too big one,not easy to store.Lay on top of it which hurts like hell(I do physical job in Chinese restaurant ), it keeps on pushing and heating. Five stars to the seller,thanks for the 20% coupon,professional and easy to work with.
customer_reviews.author: JIan chen

customer_reviews.title: The BEST
customer_reviews.text: WOW, what a little work horse. Best foot massager i have tried. You can manipulate foot angle to massage sides of arches and ankles Also works incredibly well above and below knees. Besides the back snd hamstrings, the unit can be pressed against the IT band or glute in any chair with closed arms. As a therapist I appreciate that between heated or not rotations it changes directors. You can use flap for more or less pressure and lastly my favorite feature is the rolling pressure mechanisms are flatter and it doesn't bounce off and bruise your bones or ribs. Buying 2 more for gifts
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: very firm but fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: i bruise easily but i also have really really tight muscles so tough massage comes at a bit of a cost for me, and that includes this massager, but the results are so worth it! it is tough enough to really break up my fascia and get some work done. i also love that you don't need a hand to operate it and you can move it around to different areas of your body like your arms, legs, and different parts of your back, neck and shoulders. that helps a TON. my previous massager was handheld and was exacerbating some of my issues, the opposite with this! this is the best purchase under $40 i've made all year by FAR.
customer_reviews.author: flantastic

customer_reviews.title: Very nice massage pillow
customer_reviews.text: So I just got this massage pillow today. It appears to be very well made and works very nice on whatever part of the body are using it on. I bought it for my neck and it really felt good the first 15-20 minutes I used it. This is the first one of these I have a phone. I would definitely recommended it especially for the lower price point of some of the other ones.
customer_reviews.author: shannon76

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: Because I often drive for a long time and use computers frequently, which makes my waist and cervical spine very uncomfortable. Ready I used it for more than a week and I feel better. I use this product almost twice a day. I usually massage before I go to rest, I will continue to use.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: This massage pillow gives a light massage. It is not deep, by any means. But it is just what I wanted. It does come with an optional cover pad to cover the rollers for a lighter massage, but that would be too light for me. But I definitely wanted the cover pad because all of the massage rollers in all of the massagers eventually break through their mesh. Then, to extend the life of the massager, I usually have to wrap it in a towel. However, the pad cover is like a towel when the rollers eventually break through the mesh. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Velvet T.

customer_reviews.title: Massages the stress away!
customer_reviews.text: I love this portable massager. It's great for home and car use. It can double as a pillow. Although it might still bother some people because you can kind of feel the kneading balls. It's really soft to touch. One button to simplify usage. I have chronic back and shoulder pain, it melts that tension with just enough pressure. I have a similar massager but its only for home. I'm keeping this one in the car. It doubles as a lumber pillow for me. The only thing I'm not used to is the constant moving back and forth motion it does. It's a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: April L.

customer_reviews.title: I'm a big guy (6-2 400 LBS) & works great for me.
customer_reviews.text: I use it when I am sitting in my chair at the computer, and it is able to handle my weight just fine. It feels great, if there is a sore muscle I do feel it when it works it out. I hurt my back at work along time ago, but I hate taking the pills the doctor prescribed, and this seems to help me keep from having to take them sometime, when the pain isn't to bad. But I would even recommenced this for people with normal back, as it feels great.
customer_reviews.author: NICHOLAS A. LAROSA

customer_reviews.title: Great Product... Satisfying Buy
customer_reviews.text: When I received my Snailax Massage Pillow, I was instantly pleased with the quality and feel of the pillow before I plugged it in. Once I plugged it in I knew I had bought exactly what I needed, a lightweight massage pillow that packed enough punch to grind out deep muscle tensions. This pillow is also a must have because it allows you to massage pretty much any area of the body with ease because of its manageable size and light weight. I recommend this product for anyone suffering from muscles soreness, tightness, stiffness, or someone just in need of a great relaxing massage in the privacy of their own home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This pillow is amazing !!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is extremely amazing and it gives relief almost immediately with the first use it is a very soft material and the heating is soothing to your tried and achy muscles. I highly recommend this product for anyone looking for relief.
customer_reviews.author: Butterfly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for short people like me!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Tried it out as soon as I received it! I have one of the full size chair massagers, and it's lovely but... Because I'm short, I could never get the right massage in the right spots (lumbar and shoulders). This solved that problem! Since it's a portable pillow, it can be placed exactly where you need it. Just lean back and enjoy. Since I like my massages rough, I use it without the flap, and actually use the flap to help lower it behind me and position it. It's much more lightweight then I was expecting, which makes it that much better! So far it's the perfect little gadget.
customer_reviews.author: T.M.V.

customer_reviews.title: making noise
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews for this heated massager and felt like it was the best choice for a replacement one. Deciding factor was that it had a cover over the netting to hopefully allow it to last longer than the others without that eventually all get the netting ripped. I use it at night under my leg for sciatica. Only used a week so far and it is already making noises where the mechanizes are?? Hoping this will last at least until the warranty says it will
customer_reviews.author: Fancy Pants

customer_reviews.title: Don't like the FLAT / Disc rollers
customer_reviews.text: Spacing between the rotating rollers was a little too wide between my spine. Didn't really get a deep massage even while laying on the pillow and pressing down with my body weight (5'7" - 160 lb). Created a painful result the next day from having to use so much force. Also, pressure from pushing down with my body turned off the machine. Not a good location for the on/off button. Quality product, but not for my taste.
customer_reviews.author: Pattie

customer_reviews.title: Great Massager to overcome pain
customer_reviews.text: This product exactly does what it is described. I have neck pain issue and use of the product has helped me to get rid of pain significantly. It also helps to relax muscles and get rid of stress. Product is very durable and affordable. I have been enjoying the benefits. I highly recommend buyers not to look for other alternatives as this product is made with customer in center. Additionally, you cannot beat customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Krishna Poudel

customer_reviews.title: Great relief for aching muscles!
customer_reviews.text: This really gets at those knotty places that cause you discomfort. This massager has saved me $$ that I would have spent getting a hands on massage from a professional. I still prefer the real thing, but this will definitely help get you during the in between times. I'd give this 5 stars, except that I wish the rolling massage heads were rounded vs a more squared shape. Rounded gives a bit more pinpoint massage on when you hit "that spot" and want to stay there a while. Overall, with the added bonus of being able to use in the CAR (YES!) I'd purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: BonnyLass

customer_reviews.title: Massage Pillow is AWESOME!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the massage pillow for myself. I get muscle spasms in my back and neck. I don’t like to take medication. The massage pillow is a great alternative. It works great, easy to use and the heat is an added bonus! This would make a great gift for Christmas for that loved-one that is hard to shop for! Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Christie M.

customer_reviews.title: Deep Massage
customer_reviews.text: This massage pillow is amazing. It gets deep into the sore muscles. It did not take the pain away immediately, but with any massage, it takes time. It did loosen the knots in my muscles (my main reason for purchasing this massage pillow), which alleviated my pain over a couple of days, I feel so much better. I cannot wait to get the whole back massage pad. I will be ordering that soon. Overall, this massage pillow has relaxed my muscles and it feels so good, as if someone was giving me a massage in my home.
customer_reviews.author: A Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help with my lower back pain when I couldn't get to the chiropractor. After getting it out the box I used it on my mom because she has had chronic back pain for many years. She really liked the heat and that she could change the intensity of the shiatusi. I would definitely recommend getting this item.
customer_reviews.author: Bridge

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I was just diagnosed with degenerative disc disease in my lower back. I don't like taking pain meds, so I've been plowing through the pain. I ordered this hoping it will help a little. IT HELPS A LOT! I opened it up this morning as soon as it was delivered and used it for 15 minutes. My back already feels MUCH better! I wish I ordered this months ago.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony D. Green

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: While the product was good while it lasted, it died after 1 month. Don't trust this manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Lillian Vivian

customer_reviews.title: Excellent portable shoulder and neck massager
customer_reviews.text: I really like the portability of this device. It is not heavy and bulky like the ones you have to hang over your neck. I reclined against it on my adjustable bed and plugged it in. It has a nice rotating motion which automatically changes direction. The heat feature is very nice too. I especially like the soft cover so you can lie on it comfortably. This is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Trulymadly

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing and Soothing
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to relax tired muscles in my neck and back, particularly at the end of the day. The heat and massage features work well and reliably. The comfort cover is very nice when you don't want too much pressure. I liked this massage pillow so much, I ordered the back massager. I am very happy with the purchase and don't have any complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Gage Family

customer_reviews.title: OMG
customer_reviews.text: I got this for the back of my neck and it squeezes so hard it makes you go ouch and that's what I wanted. I also used it on the back of my ankle, calf, knee and thigh and its great there too. Maybe I will plug it into my car and use it for what it was made for and that is massaging your lumbar .
customer_reviews.author: SASQUATCH

customer_reviews.title: Another one added to my collection!
customer_reviews.text: I recently ordered the lower back massage pillow and decided to give the full back massage pillow a try, as I fell in love with the lower back pillow. I have been suffering from chronic pain for the last 3 years with no real pain relief despite physical therapy, pain management etc. I have had some newer pain issues develop along my spine and arthritis of the joints in my back. So this full back messager was like my own piece of heaven.
customer_reviews.author: Cierra

customer_reviews.title: Feels so good 😊
customer_reviews.text: This really has helped my fathers lower back pain it really hit the spot. The heat is also great and the padded cover helps if it feels too hot or too much pressure. I am going to buy another one as a gift. Fast shipping, great price, wonderful customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Barney

customer_reviews.title: For the price, it's not bad
customer_reviews.text: This little massager was a good price and it works ok. The massage it provides is pretty relaxing, although not nearly as good as the real thing, but I'm single and I don't go to a massage therapist either, so this is better than nothing! The heat it provides on the back etc is a great addition. It is sometimes a pain to get it to stay in a single spot because the plug can pull out but it's not too big of a deal if you have a close power outlet. Overall, for its price, it's not bad...even to just have around for sporadic uses.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good Little Massager
customer_reviews.text: Small and convenient- but shuts off too quickly... Does help when it's working though... I don't find this product as strong as some but the less intensive/strong massager-for me- is more easily tolerated. (My weight is below 70 pound's so it makes a difference. )For the right price this is a nice little product
customer_reviews.author: PediRN

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price. Lots of pros, very minor cons.
customer_reviews.text: Can be kind of awkward, but it's really good and decent for the price. The heat is OK, not overly hot and very comfy. It's completely worth having. There are two plug versions, to a regular outlet and a car charger. It is not rechargeable, it is not a cordless product. It is a wired product. The biggest con is minor. The shape of the kneaders are flat headed, not a bulb shape like a lot of similar massagers. The edges arent sharp, but sometimes you can notice the edges.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Best massage pillow I’ve ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased massage pillows like this from Homedics at Bed Bath and Beyond for the past 15 years for around $80.00, and they were great. This one is even better. The shiatsu “knuckles” as I call them rotate clockwise for a minute, then it stops and starts rotating counter-clockwise. Amazing technology, especially for the price! On top of that, this company is based in Ann Arbor, MIchigan! I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Matthias Krenzer

customer_reviews.title: So soft and plush. I love it!!
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is so soft. I love the plush material. Snailax makes the best massagers, and I own 2 of their massage pillows. If you are looking for a massage pillow that is soft and plush, this is it! You will be very satisfied with this one. It also comes with a power adapter for the car, so you can take it on the go. I highly recommend this massage pillow by Snailax!
customer_reviews.author: Heather R.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I immediately used it as soon as the package arrived. It's much more powerful than I expected. I was afraid this type of portable massage tool might be too "gentle" or won't provide enough relaxation, but to my surprise, this one is quite good. My husband even complained it "hurt". The heat function is a plus as well. My kids were fighting to use it.
customer_reviews.author: cc

customer_reviews.title: Total Disaster !  Piece of JUNK
customer_reviews.text: Wheels wouldn’t even turn when placed on back. About as much power as a kids wind up toy you would buy at a Five and Dime. Honestly the seller should be ASHAMED. This is not an exaggeration. What a waste of time and money. I’m furious.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser

customer_reviews.title: Our third purchase...perfect gift!
customer_reviews.text: The massager is wonderful,only wish it never turned off. Can move it around to wherever you need it. Flap cover is useful for times when you want it a little lighter massage, then you cover the revolving balls with the flap. Mom and both sisters have one now. Christmas is coming, and we may buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Sealmagic

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Not being able to get a massage these days I did some heavy research on the type of neck and back massager that was affordable but also versatile because usually I'd like to focus on one area of my body which differs each time. This massager fit the bill, with in days I've already used it sitting down on my back as well as laying in my bed for my neck and shoulders. It seems very well built and very soft material. I also loved that it is quiet enought to be using it while watching tv or someone sleeping next to you. Very impressed, thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Massage At A Terrific Price
customer_reviews.text: This massage has been used for multiple body areas. My wife has migraine headaches and finds it especially helpful to work out tension. She has also used it to massage her calf muscles. I have used for my neck. It is very well constructed, to date have nothing negative to say, simple to use and so far have enjoyed it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Wile

customer_reviews.title: Good massager
customer_reviews.text: Happy with purchase. So relaxing. Bought 2 - 1 for myself & 1 for my mother. Had to return my mother’s because it was missing the home adapter, it just came with the car adapter. Not a big deal. Had a replacement sent out. Issue was resolved. We both love our massager.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best gift ever!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nephew for Christmas. He plays a lot of sports and is still growing. He suffers from a lot of leg pain. He grabbed this thing like it was the best gift in earth and used it right away on Christmas. Then I got hugs...from a teenage boy...that's huge.
customer_reviews.author: Heather N

customer_reviews.title: Portable shiatsu
customer_reviews.text: Nice soft cover, very portable. I’ve used it to work out the kinks in my neck and the back of my leg. It’s a pretty intense massage if you put your weight on it, but I think you could add an extra towel to soften it.
customer_reviews.author: Lyte

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: When using this massage pillow, it makes feel very comfortable and relaxed with good amount of pressure that doesn’t make it too hard on your neck. And it is light weight and nice size too to be moved around from the house to the car.
customer_reviews.author: JQ

customer_reviews.title: Great for the back
customer_reviews.text: This product is fantastic! It works on the neck, upper back, mid back, and lower back. The mechanics are relatively quiet, and the massage power is great. The “heat” element is slightly disappointing as it only gets slightly warm.
customer_reviews.author: Writer78

customer_reviews.title: That works great for my neck
customer_reviews.text: Purchased it week ago. Perfect for my neck area. Better yet, it works even for my lower back. The massage works so well that it has become part of my routines to put it on my neck and shoulders areas for 30 mins as I relax right before go to bed. Super product quality and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jane H.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend fell asleep first time using this! Thankfully it automatically shuts off after a while. Hard to believe how effective this little thing is!
customer_reviews.author: Emme

customer_reviews.title: Best massage I have tried!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several shiatsu massagers over the last several years, and this is by far my favorite! I love the cover part, and it does a great job of working your muscles.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Allred

customer_reviews.title: Helllllllp meeeeee!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this joint for 5 days and it’s already making creaky, grinding sounds like you’d hear in a horror movie. I’m wondering if it’s going to come after me while I’m sleeping. 👻
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Deep tissue massage
customer_reviews.text: This massager is very effective at working out very tight muscles in my lumbar / lower back. My massage therapist couldn’t reach the deepest muscle (QL) but this shiatsu massager worked this area so well that I’ve been pain free after 2 15minute sessions. I highly recommend this massager! You won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Paulette

customer_reviews.title: Before you buying should go on reviews read the comment
customer_reviews.text: My wife she has a pain on her neck for long time so I sawed it on Amazon I get for her she do around 10 minutes a night and now she a lot better I recommend it good for someone has pain on neck
customer_reviews.author: H-O

customer_reviews.title: This Pillow
customer_reviews.text: Is a life saver for those that have lower back issues and it warms up (if you press the button 2 times) while it massages. I love mine
customer_reviews.author: MistressAK

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was hoping for!
customer_reviews.text: Received in one day! Tried it immediately on my lower back. The heated massage was more than I expected. Sooth and release tight muscles. So relaxing, not too intense for me. I didn’t want to turn it off . Very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: S. Stokes

customer_reviews.title: No heating and not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This product does not have heating effect. They mention that the heating is to come from the motor when put under load. Also, the motor just rotates in clock and anti-clock directions with no change in position. It starts hurting you after some time.
customer_reviews.author: Rj

customer_reviews.title: Best pillow massager out there!
customer_reviews.text: I need to tell you that I go through a pillow massager like a hot cakes. I have severe back pain that I need this all the time. All others, I had to throw it away for several reasons - they have a hole in the mesh, they stopped working, no more heat coming out and etc. So far this is the best of what it's out there. Little cover helps with soft spots like back of your neck. I love this!
customer_reviews.author: Grace Park

customer_reviews.title: Quick pain relief
customer_reviews.text: I used this massage pillow on my lower back after experiencing some muscular pain and it provided quick relief that lasted though the next day. I'm on my feet all day, moving heavy equipment and patients around and it's nice to know that - since I cannot afford a jacuzzi - my pillow massager works great!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Murray

customer_reviews.title: Over all Great, not a single issue or concern with my purchase and continued use
customer_reviews.text: The material softness and convenience to use for a softer or stronger massage with the attached flap are all great benefits. It's also great to have the convenience to use at home or in a vehicle. The adapter cord snaps in place tightly and snug, that itself saves alot of inconvenience based on several comparbly products in this category. I use this for back and neck tension when its needed and it offers some relief within 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Carebear

customer_reviews.title: Works if you know how to massage.
customer_reviews.text: This is a temparory massage solution. It is not a $$$ massage chair but it is just pillow with spinning parts. You apply the pressure according to your needs and it works if you know what to do.
customer_reviews.author: Emek

customer_reviews.title: Massage master
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pillow hoping it would give me relief from back and neck pain. I have paid for massage many years. This pillow is one third the price of a massage. It never gets tired or runs out of time. I don't have to drive to the masseuse or leave a tip. The heat works great. I would tell anyone thinking about purchasing this to go for it. I am very pleased with the pillow. It helps me with the pain better than any other device. And the price is right..
customer_reviews.author: Barbara L Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Very compact and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for something that was not too bulky, did what was advertised and was not economical. We found a good match and are quite happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: HoomanDad

customer_reviews.title: Loud and not enough pressure.
customer_reviews.text: This massager is loud and creaks and crackles during the entire time it is on. Not powerful enough to work out the tension in my calf muscles which is why I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Alisa Lehova

customer_reviews.title: Great massager
customer_reviews.text: I really like this massager. My favorite feature is that it will reverse motion while in use. I am pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: toreyp123

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful
customer_reviews.text: This massage pillow is awesome! I use it every night when I sit in my recliner. The massaging and heat combination help my back pain immensely. Great value and convenient to use!
customer_reviews.author: Natalia Benson

customer_reviews.title: Died after 11 Months
customer_reviews.text: Died after 11 months. The foam deteriorated over time on the inside by the rollers. Even with heat off it got hot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not As Intense As Other Massagers
customer_reviews.text: The massage action is adequate, but I have used other pillow massagers that I like better. When I am in pain, I need an intense massage, and this pillow's massage is too gentle due to the flat tops of the massage nodes.
customer_reviews.author: Miz C.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: This has really helped the neck and shoulder pain that I have had. I don't need to go to the chiropractor very often now .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy massage pillow definitely worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a product exceeded my expectation! I chose the soft surface pillow, turned out to be a good choice m - it is easier for me to experience the strength of massage for my neck and my back. The mechanism inside the pillow can move and adjust their positions, which offers larger area of massage. It’s perfect gift for people using computer a lot. I’m thinking of buying a second for my parents. Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: ririandxixi

customer_reviews.title: Good, but LOUD.
customer_reviews.text: Works great to help with knots but is so loud! Would be much more relaxing if it didn't make so much noise.
customer_reviews.author: M. Chen

customer_reviews.title: Great for knots in neck and back
customer_reviews.text: Massager was a gift for my husband, but I think I use it more than he does! it helps greatly with knots in the neck and back. I like the two-direction massage and option for heat. It's easy to use as well.
customer_reviews.author: Spring Mulder

customer_reviews.title: Back Saver During Long Hours of Work
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! It is exactly what my back needed. Gave it 4 stars because I wish it had a something to keep it attached to my chair
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Love my Shiatsu Massage Pillow~
customer_reviews.text: I have suffered for years with lower back issues, and I found relief after using the massage pillow. The kneading felt great.
customer_reviews.author: G. V. Reichert

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. This is second one I purchased will buy more fir Christmas gifts
customer_reviews.author: aprille

customer_reviews.title: Great product, nice price!
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my husband who always has tight muscles and he LOVES it. The kids like laying on it to. It is great for your neck and shoulders. You always know who’s using it because you hear these oh, ah sounds. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Hard and bulky
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for a softer pillow for my elderly father who has neck discomfort. Hard and bulky for him. Had to send back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Take Anywhere Massager!
customer_reviews.text: My whole family LOVES this massage pillow! My husband & son are fighting over who gets to use it next at home; they're already begging me to buy a couple more. Also so portable! The car charger it came with was so handy. Our son used the massage pillow using the car charger after his hockey practice and it was the ultimate pain & tightness cure.
customer_reviews.author: L Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Soft and therapeutic
customer_reviews.text: I was looking around a couple massage pillows and decided on this one because it has a soft flap to reduce the intensity. I’m a huge fan of it. I would recommend using it primarily for upper back/legs because in my gym’s PT class, they recommend against foam rolling/SMR on the lower back area. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Should keep for a long time
customer_reviews.text: Gone through several of these, don’t believe I will need to replace no sign of wear. After a short period of time the other brands I’ve tried start coming apart
customer_reviews.author: Thomas R. H

customer_reviews.title: Message Pillow
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best purchase. The rotating balls are great after a long day's work. It relaxes the muscles and you can you use anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Soraya C. Balbin

customer_reviews.title: It's WORKS
customer_reviews.text: I have had ongoing pain in my lower back, nothing was relieving it except this pillow. Massage was nice and soft, felt like I had hands on my back massaging me, heat was just enough not to feel hot. Was so relaxing I felt as though I could fall asleep. I would definitely recommend this product. I did not rate the battery life because this particular model did not run on battery, has a nice long cord.
customer_reviews.author: nancy

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: I brought this one because I need to reduce pain and relieve the tight muscles on my thigh. As a waitress I always standing so unfortunately I get varicosity .The massage pillow works great to me .Will recommend it
customer_reviews.author: qing ya lin

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, quiet back massager
customer_reviews.text: I like the flat instead of rounded heads on the massaging balls and the optional cover. Very comfortable! And it makes no noise.
customer_reviews.author: S. Olney

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I use this machine every night and I’m surprised that it’s held up this long. I’ve had this for 4 months and it’s great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great relaxing massage from a machine.
customer_reviews.text: I really don’t have many machine massagers the allow me to relax so well that it makes me nod off. This one does. It is sweet and versatile for neck and lower back and thighs and calves.
customer_reviews.author: Farmer j

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: It works really well so far, I've only used it twice but it helped some neck pain I was having for days
customer_reviews.author: Tambee

customer_reviews.title: Lower Back Pain
customer_reviews.text: This is great for my lower back pain. Love it!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Cps

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is THE BEST messager that I have ever got. the ones that I got before are all messaging too hard , while this one has a very nice and soft flip that softens the strength . It heats up when click twice on the switch , and rolls in clockwise and anti-clockwise motion . I just love the texture of the case and flip .
customer_reviews.author: Kacie

customer_reviews.title: The shiatsu motion feels great!
customer_reviews.text: I love the shiatsu massaging motion...it creates the feeling of a live massage. Way better than vibration. This massage pillow is nice and plush and comfortable when you want some relief in the neck area. Have also used it on my calves and feet, so it's great for versatility. Bought one for me and one for my dad for Father's Day. He's been enjoying it too!
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Massage Pillow
customer_reviews.text: This massage pillow is so amazing. I have back pain from my shoulders all the way down to my lower back and it helps so much to use this massage pillow. I just keep moving it from one area to the next. My daughter let me use hers and I ordered one immediately. I had been searching for a massage pillow and so glad my daughter found this one and let me try hers.
customer_reviews.author: herby

customer_reviews.title: A Pleasant Surprise
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes you order items not quite sure how they will really be when they arrive. The snailax massage pillow was a pleasant surprise - it is so enjoyable! Everyone in our household likes to use the pillow for lower back pain or neck pain. It's very relaxing and firm enough without hurting. Highly recommend,
customer_reviews.author: Jim Jones

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best purchase I have done in a while. Its very simple to use with one control. The best part is that it changes motion by itself from clockwise to anti clockwise, switches off by itself after sometime. It also comes up with a car adapter which was a great addon feature. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made.
customer_reviews.text: I use it every day. So far no problems. I hope it lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: TCB

customer_reviews.title: The flap is a great feature due to preference of intensity.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had a knot in my back for two weeks. With limited money I can’t afford the luxury of a massage. Wit nobody else at home to rub it out for me I thought I would give this a shot. I am really satisfied with this pillow and am already trying to think of friends who may enjoy it as well. This will be a great Christmas gift to give.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: So soothing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my invalid husband and he loves it. It is so healing and I love it too.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann Koch

customer_reviews.title: Price is great, easy to use, portable
customer_reviews.text: Love love love. AC plug and car charger! I can get a quick massage after a long day on my feet as a nurse! I'm ordering more as gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Cupcake

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Xmas Gift to myself
customer_reviews.text: Works right out of the box. The lower back massager of our expensive whole body massager chair failed shortly after warranty period and would cost hundreds of $ to repair it, this unit is a perfect fit to make the chair whole again.
customer_reviews.author: SunnySmile

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 70 year old mom, she has arthritis and muscle aches. She absolutely loved this it really massages deep.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: This machine really works and I live it. It has helped a lot with my neck and shoulder pain. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have for neck pain
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for neck knots and tense muscles. I am glad I got it in budget.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Convenient both for my house and my car
customer_reviews.text: Back pain relieves with this product Will recommend to my other friends and families
customer_reviews.author: romulo nunag

customer_reviews.title: convient and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: everything good easy to use very versatile use at foot ,legs, knees , thigh, lower and upper back and neck never see so good and portable and easy to carry recommends to every one from young to old
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good pillow
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this pillow! I was able to sleep better after using it, and I’ve never felt better! The heating function makes my massages feel much better.
customer_reviews.author: ian1157

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, multi-use massager
customer_reviews.text: The best think about this massager is that you can maneuver it to work on many different areas of the body, including neck, back, legs and feet. The small size allows it to be used on pretty much any sore spot that you may have. You can have a neck massage while sitting on the couch, or stretch your legs out and let it work you tight hamstrings or quads. The heat feature is just an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Snailax Shiatsu Massage Pillow with Heat -Deep Kneading Neck Shoulder Lumbar Calf Leg Foot Back Massager, Plush Cozy Design,Portable Electric Massager for Full Body Muscle Pain Relief
feature_bullets: DEEP TISSUE SHIATSU MASSAGE- The massage pillow utilizes 4 rotation shiatsu nodes to provide deep tissue kneading massage to relax your tense & sore muscles, tight knots, ease fatigue and muscle pain. You can position the pillow massager in many ways so as to effectively reach your boby any area, it can target your neck, shoulders, back, lumbar, and legs foot massage.

OPTIONAL HEAT THERAPY - This back massager with Heat function adds gentle warmth that helps to further soothe tired muscles and melt away the tension in your upper back,lower back, neck and shoulders,etc. Activate the heating therapy function to enhance your massage experience and soothe tired muscles, enhance blood circulation

LIGHTWEIGHT & PORTABLE- This neck back massager is designed as a portable massage cushion,is lightweight &compact. Conveniently take it with you to work, travel, allows you enjoy comfortable back neck massage on-the-go. Most individuals seek relief from muscle soreness and discomfort.This massager is a perfect multi-purpose for these troublesome aches and pains. Such a small convenient massage pillow is the perfect gift for your loved ones.

OPTIC PLUSH SOFT DESIGN-This massage chair pad, its cover is made of 100% ultra cozy plush,incomparably soft polyester that offers a comfortable and great feeling for body touch. It is equipped with an adjustable flap that provides some protective padding if shiatsu massage get too intense for you.

VERSATILE USE - This massage cushion comes with a home adapter and a car adapter, allows you enjoy a relaxing like spamassage at home, office or in the car. This massage pillow is a comfortable massage pad fits well in most chairs or car seat. 100% MANUFACTURES GUARANTEE –For any reason, if this massage machine does not meet your expectations, return it within 30 days and get your money back.
